content:
剑魂技能

lv1 Upward Slash 上挑

lv5 Guard 格挡

Thrust 连突刺

lv10 Asheville Fork 银光落刃

Triple Slash 三段斩

lv15 Aerial Chain Slash 空中连击

Katana Mastery 太刀精通

Short Sword Mastery 短剑精通

Bludgeon Mastery 钝器精通

Zanbato Mastery 巨剑精通

Cancel-Guard 强制-格挡

Cancel-Upward Slash 强制-格挡

lv18 Lightsabre License 光剑掌握

Lightsabre Mastery 光剑精通

Tempered Attack 武器节制

Rapid Weapon Switch 疾影手

Weapon Wielder's Zenith 武器奥义

lv20 Backstep Cutter 后跳斩

Cancel-Triple Slash 强制-三段斩

Secret Slayer Technique 里鬼剑术

lv25 Auto Guard 自动格挡

Overdrive 破极兵刃

lv30 Flip Side Counter 逆转反击

Draw Sword 拔刀斩

lv35 Charge Crash 破军升龙击

lv40 Raging Dragon Slash 猛龙断空斩

lv45 Illusion Sword Dance 幻影剑舞

Cancel-Charge Crash 强制-破军升龙击

Awakening：Ultimate Slayer Skill：Sword Storm 极鬼剑术（暴风式）

Ultimate Slayer Skill：Iron Strike 极鬼剑术（斩铁式）
